name: Fire of inspiration
description:
You have 5 wishes - to make five masterpieces (game, painting, music, poetry, sculpture).

So far, you have a "fire of inspiration", but it is gradually going out, so do not stop and hurry to create a masterpiece.

It is necessary to keep inspiration, collecting sparks of inspiration (its particles). Having collected all the sparks of inspiration, you can create a masterpiece.

At each level, you need to keep the "fire of inspiration" and avoid what extinguishes your inspiration.

The game has 5+1 levels.
